    • getReliefNbIterationsValue

      public int[] getReliefNbIterationsValue(int nbInstances)
      Returns a list, containing the numbers of the iterations. If this setting is given as a (list of) proportion(s) of the instances in the training set, we convert it into absolute values.

      If the only value is 1, i.e., 1.0, we assume that this means all (100%) instances.

      Parameters:
      nbInstances - The number of instances in the training set.
